## Portland AirBNB

[Portland has AirBNB data available](http://insideairbnb.com/get-the-data.html) and we can use it for things.


```{r}
listings <- read.csv(url("http://data.insideairbnb.com/united-states/or/portland/2020-07-07/visualisations/listings.csv"))
reviews <- read.csv(url("http://data.insideairbnb.com/united-states/or/portland/2020-07-07/visualisations/reviews.csv"))
```
